en.pageDesc: Check how to access Mockoon's entering requests logs for easier debugging
en.pageSubtitle: Check how to access Mockoon's entering requests logs for easier debugging
en.text1: For easier debugging, Mockoon log all entering requests for each of your environment. To access the logs it's very simple:
en.text2: After selecting the environment you are interested in open the requests logs by clicking on the clock icon in the upper right corner:
en.text3: You will see in the list all the requests intercepted by Mockoon on the currently selected environment. Please note that all requests are intercepted even favicon requests made by browsers!
en.text4: Complete headers list, route (URL) params, query params, and body in raw format are all included in the request's details.
